thread.title: MSI Gets Head Start on Annual Canned Food Drive
thread.title_full: MSI Gets Head Start on Annual Canned Food Drive

author: Ricardo Mendiola
title: MSI Gets Head Start on Annual Canned Food Drive
text:
Every year, MSI Credit Solutions has been hosting a canned food drive and donations in the fall to provide charities and local families in need with food. In years past, MSI has donated to charities like North Texas Food Bank, Brother Bill’s Helping Hand, local churches, and families around the community who have reached out asking for assistance via social media outlets. This November, MSI Credit Solutions will begin gathering and collecting any canned foods and other donations to those who want to support the cause. The November Food Drive is made possible by MSI employees who donate their time and canned goods, as well.
At the conclusion of this year’s November Food Drive, all donations will be sent out to a local Dallas charity, community church or local families who reach out to MSI Credit Solutions in need.
Check out MSI Credit Solutions’ coverage from previous drives: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e3QuR11idvI . To learn more about this year’s November Food Drive, please contact MSI Credit Solutions.
About the company:
MSI Credit Solutions is committed to helping the local community. The company actively engages in a number of community events and charity efforts throughout the year. Some of these include hosting a canned food drive for the North Texas Food Bank and the annual holiday toy drive.
MSI Credit Solutions aims to help both community members and their customers plan for a better future. They offer credit repair and restoration services to help their clients increase Established in 2006, MSI is one of the leading credit repair companies in the industry.
MSI Credit Solutions is located at 12790 Merit Dr. Suite 614, Dallas, TX 75251. To learn more about MSI Credit Solutions, visit their website at http://www.msicreditdfw.com/ .
